channel.title: Party hat wont stay in head slot [EQUITMENT]
channel.description: Party hat won't stay in the head slot in the armor tab is there a way I can put it on the head? it is a custom partyhat. Thank you

item.title: Party hat wont stay in head slot [EQUITMENT]
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

You have to reference the ID of the item into the correct slot which you can do in ItemAssistant.java

Read full topic
item.source: Party hat wont stay in head slot [EQUITMENT]
